FuncDef:
The mpls te p2mp-te auto-frr enable command enables P2MP TE Auto FRR globally.
The undo mpls te p2mp-te auto-frr enable command disables P2MP TE Auto FRR globally.
By default, P2MP TE Auto FRR is disabled globally.
CLIs: undo mpls te p2mp-te auto-frr enable
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
FRR protection is configured for networks requiring high reliability. If P2MP TE manual FRR is used, a lot of configurations are needed on the network with complex topology and a great number of links to be protected. In this situation, P2MP TE Auto FRR can be configured.
Unlike P2MP TE manual FRR, P2MP TE Auto FRR automatically creates a bypass tunnel that meets traffic requirements, which simplifies configurations. To configure P2MP TE Auto FRR, run the mpls te p2mp-te auto-frr enable command.
Prerequisites
Auto FRR has been globally enabled using the mpls te auto-frr command.P2MP TE has been enabled globally using the mpls te p2mp-te command.
